msContents.summary: Register of cargo ships arrived in Alexandria from Ostia and the port stations of the eastern mediterranean.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

condition.ab: The papyrus is mutilated at many points. Many holes. A kollesis c. 4.5 cm from the right margin.;Two smaller fragmen c. 1 x 0.3 cm are mounted in the same frame. Both have same traces of ink, but they are not located in the document.

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: Attalion, north coast in central Crete;;Aigeai, Asia Minor;;Paltos, Syria;;Laodike, Syria;;Anemourion, Asia Minor;;Ostia, Italy;;Side, Asia Minor;;Gagai, Asia Minor;;Lib(yssa?), Black Sea;;Liv(iopolis?), Black Sea;;Dioryx(?);;Aspendos, Asia Minor

div.ab: ...;oil. From Attalion of Crete [the ... (ship) of NN], son of Sozomenos, "Furies(?) and Fortune". Asklep( ) ... art. [transported for NN x] demi-jars of oil, and for Serenos, 41 demi-jars of oil. 26?;From Aigeai. 20. The ship of Diodoros, son of Athenodoros, "Sarapis and Fortune". Harpokrates. 2000 artabae. Transported for the naucleros 700 jars of red wine.;From Aigeai. 20. The ... of Demetrios, [son of NN], "Philometor". Similarly. x artabae. Transported for the naucleros, x jars of red Aigean wine.;From Ostia, 1[]. [The ship] of Lucius Pompeius Metrodoros, ["(name of the ship)" ];22.500 artabae. To sail in.;From Lib( ), 5. The ship of Publius Aelius Ann..., "Ele...";2000 artabae. To sail in.;Oil. From the Canal. 26. The ship of Basilon, son of Libus(?), "Athena R...";1000 artabae. Transported for Caesar the lord, x semi-jars of oil.;From Paltos. 20. [The ship] of Zenon, son of Protos, "Dragon";2500 artabae. Transport for Heliodoros 500 jars of wine.;From Laodike, 18. The ship of Kassianos, son of Kyros and of Dominios, son of Agathokles, "Elpis and ...". Isi( );2000 artabae, transported for Dominios [x jars] of wine.;From Gagai. 6. [The ship] of Neon, son of Varos, "Asklepios and Sarapis". Harpok(rat--);1500 artabae. Transported for Claudius Crispinus 300 jars of first quality Sidean wine et figs ...;From Side, 7. The ship of Gaius Ulpius Iason, "Elpis and Ourania";7000 artabae. Transported for the Caesar the lord 32 (?) of pine and for Numerios alias Kallistratos 216 demi-jars of Aspendian oil .;From Anemourion. 13. the ship of Ninos, son of Tounis, "Zeus, Aphrodite and Selene";arta .... Transported for the naucleros 2500 jars of Sidean wine .
